english.segment1: Our lives up to this point have lead to this. A garden in the dark, a deadly kiss (Matthew 36:47-49). If you want to follow me. Well walk into suffering. Its this act that will distinguish us
english.segment2: My disciples, those Ive chosen (John 15:16). Dont listen to the sirens. Dont you know that I would never lead you astray. Tie yourself to the mast and cover your ears with wax and. Keep your gaze on me, for Gods sake stay awake
english.segment3: Sometimes you have to close your eyes to see. Sometimes to walk you have to get down on your knees. All I ask is that you pray. All I ask is that you stay awake. But your dreams betray me
english.segment4: My disciples, those Ive chosen. Dont listen to the sirens. Dont you know that I would never lead you astray. Tie yourself to the mast and cover your ears with wax and. Keep your gaze on me, for Gods sake stay awake
english.segment6: Are you resting? Are you still asleep?
english.segment7: Wake Up, O Sleeper (Ephesians 5:14). Wake Up and say a prayer. Wake Up, O Sleeper. Are you my betrayer?. Wake up, O Sleeper. Wake up, O Sleeper. Incomprehensible, Incomprehensible
